title: Strengthening Data Science Competencies: Chemistry Education Leadership Programs Using Multimodal Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of Fundamental Chemistry Concepts and Basic Digital Tool Utilization
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can produce digital animations explaining chemical concepts by applying multimodal design principles.
Learners can propose three or more methods to represent abstract chemical phenomena (e.g., phase changes of water molecules) using visual and auditory elements.
Learners can analyze scientific meanings in peers' digital artifacts with over 80% accuracy through metareflective discussions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
